Description:

Batman: Arkham Origins - third edition of the famous series of Batman: Arkham. You again have to go to a gloomy Gotham.However, this time you can take part in the events anticipated the Batman: Arkham Asylum and Ã‚Â«Batman: Arkham City."
The game takes place a few years before the infamous mutiny. Batman is just starting his career with a secret crime fighter, he is young and inexperienced, and it will only become the Dark Knight, we know ...
Subject campaign Ã‚Â«Batman: Arkham OriginsÃ‚Â» tells an entirely new story authored by writers Michael "Dooma" Vendshu and Corey May , behind which the joint work on games such as Prince Persia: Warrior Within, Assassin's Creed, Army of Two. Consultant is the creative director of DC Comics Geoff Johns. You will witness the early years of Batman as a fighter against crime and first encounter with those who in the future will be the sworn enemies of the Dark Knight.
Crime Scene The new system simplifies the process of gathering information. With the help of cutting-edge gadgets Batman can recreate a virtual version of what happened at the crime scene and discover clues, invisible to the naked eye. On the dark streets of Gotham Batman will face a lot of well-known characters, including Black Mask, Deftrouk, Bane, Joker, Anarchy, Captain Gordon and others.
Attachment "Initiation" go back in time, when no Batman was not there, and give the young Bruce Wayne complete martial arts training. Experience the exotic locations, including bamboo forest and monastery on top of a mountain. This set includes images of Bruce Wayne'''' and'' Avenger'', four cards trials and testing campaign.
And in addition "Cold, Cold Heart" Batman will have to fight with Mr. Freeze, who wants to freeze all of Gotham City, and itself "bat" to turn into an ice statue ..

Game Features
" You will Gotham. in new and familiar places waiting for a variety of opponents, which will overcome the crimes that need to investigate, and mysteries to be unraveled.
